DOC.brief_summary: The telavancin observational use registry ( TOUR ) collect data support study efficacy , safety , pattern use telavancin hospital-based inpatient outpatient treat infusion center receive clinician direct telavancin therapy .
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective medical chart review , multicenter , observational study examine telavancin efficacy safety real-word set characterize pattern use telavancin hospital-based inpatient outpatient infusion center . All treatment decision clinical assessment make discretion treat physician per usual care mandate study design protocol .
